HTMLFieldSetElementDisabled.summary: The disabled property of the interface is a boolean value that reflects the {{htmlelement("fieldset")}} element's disabled attribute, which indicates whether the control is disabled.

remarks.para: When disabled, all the form control descendants of the <fieldset> element, excluding elements that are descendants of the legend child of the <fieldset>, if any, are disabled. A disabled element is unusable and un-clickable, and match the :disabled selector, even if their disabled property value is false.
